DOC.brief_summary: This retrospective chart review study determine Deplin® 7.5mg-15mg combine antidepressant well antidepressant alone adult major depression .
DOC.brief_title: Combination Deplin® Antidepressant Therapy Major Depressive Episode ( MDE ) - Retrospective Analysis
DOC.criteria: Males female age 1870 The active arm ( Arm # 1 ) include randomly select 100125 chart patient primary diagnosis major depression CGIS ≥4 begin Deplin SSRI SNRI therapy time begin January 2007 present ; , Control group ( Arm # 2 ) include randomly select 125150 chart patient primary diagnosis major depression begin SSRI SNRI therapy match severity ( CGIS ≥4 ) Folic acid > 400 mcg take time study Psychotic feature current episode history psychotic feature Any bipolar disorder ( current past ) psychotic disorder ( current past ) Current past treatment vagus nerve stimulation , ECT , transcranial magnetic stimulation Antipsychotic therapy conjunction antidepressant currently past 4 week
